entries.name: DEFAULT
entries.desc:
Default values for a SSLConfig instance.
See ::new for more details

entries.name: [](key)
entries.desc: A convenience method to access the values like a Hash

entries.name: accept(tcp)
entries.desc: Accept connection to IO tcp, with context of the current certificate configuration

entries.name: connect(tcp)
entries.desc: Connect to IO tcp, with context of the current certificate configuration

entries.name: setup_certificate()
entries.desc: Ensures that :SSLCertificate and :SSLPrivateKey have been provided or that a new certificate is generated with the other parameters provided.

entries.name: setup_ssl_context()
entries.desc: Establish the OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext with the configuration parameters provided.
